org.cougaar.core.thread
Interface CougaarThread

public interface CougaarThread

Defines a set of Schedulable state constants. The only states supported right now are RUNNING (active), PENDING (queued), and DORMANT (neither). We may eventually have a use for DISQUALIFIED (the ThreadControlService has prevented it from running). SUSPENDED is here for historical reasons and will almost never be supported. Note that these states are purely for informational purposes. They're not used internally in any way.

Field Summary
static int THREAD_DISQUALIFIED
          The Schedulable has been disqualified by the ThreadControlService.
static int THREAD_DORMANT
          The Schedulable is qualified but neither running nor queued.
static int THREAD_PENDING
          The Schedulable is currently queued.
static int THREAD_RUNNING
          The Schedulable is currently running.
static int THREAD_SUSPENDED
          Not supported, but would in theory mean the Schedulable has suspended itself.
